properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:25AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
Lake effect snow will develop as winds turn northwest off Lake
Erie ahead of a high pressure system moving into the region. The
snow will occur through much of today before tapering off
this evening as drier air moves in.

* WHAT...Snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 2 to locally
5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Southern Erie county.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
